page.title: 19BUILTH'S FAMOUS STATUE
page.content: The latest statue to be erected in Builth is of a Greek god in memory of T.Harri Jones,a famous Welsh poet. The statue has been the centre of ridicule for the townspeople of Builth because it is a nude figure. It has recently had its private parts cut off and other parts cut off here and there.It has also been daubed with a tarry black paint which will not come off. The statue was unveiled about 3 months ago and B.B.C. radio and television crews were present to record the occasion. Harri Jones was born at Cwmcrogau in Llanafan. He attended Builth High School and afterwards emigrated to Australia where he was tragically drowned in an accident. My grandfather knew him and says he was a "loner" with not many friends.{(CONTINUED)
